a.h1: Lake Fenton Community Schools Learning for Continuous Success

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Our Continuity of Learning plan has been approved and is available at https://5il.co/f91p

Lighting up the field for the class of 2020! Tonight, Lake Fenton has joined a nationwide movement, turning on our football field lights at 8:20p.m. (2020 military time) for 20 minutes, 20 seconds to honor the 2020 graduating seniors. This is for you 2020 Blue Devils! #LFLeads view image
Congratulations to this week’s gift card winners for your hard work! Names will be selected again next week. #LFLeads view image

Google did an update that our content filter was not compatible with. The filter vendor pushed out an update but not all chromebooks received it right away. If you are still having issues, hold down refresh and press the power button to do a hard reset and force the update.

We are currently experiencing issues with our Internet filter. This will cause intermittent issues with chromebooks at home. We are working to correct the issue and will provide an update when it's corrected.

p.a: Event: MS 7th grade Softball/Baseball vs Flushing

h3.a: School of Choice Intent to Return Notice

div.p: Dear Parents, In years past, Lake Fenton has sent out a notice to parents of school of choice students asking for their child's intent for returning to the school district for the following year. ...
The Lake Fenton Policy Committee will be holding a virtual policy committee meeting on Thursday, April 23, 2020 at 9:00 a.m. Please see the notice for instructions on how to access the virtual...
Please see the posting to apply.
